00005 function getArrayCode($obj)
00006 {
00007   $vars = get_object_vars($obj);
00008   if(array_key_exists('return', $vars))
00009   {
00010     echo "    return \$this->soapreturn(array(\n";
00011     foreach($vars['return'] as $name => $value)
00012     {
00013       $value = strlen($value) > 0 ? "'$value'" : 'null';
00014       echo sprintf("      '%s' => %s,\n",$name,$value);
00015     }
00016     echo "    ));\n\n";
00017   }
00018   else
00019   {
00020     echo "no return found: ";
00021     var_dump($obj);
00022   }
00023 }

00025 function rshash($string)
00026 {
00027         $hash = shell_exec('bin/RSHash '.escapeshellarg($string));
00028 }
